title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 62 - Veterinary Medicine
content:

State Regulations
§ 62.1 - Professional study of veterinary medicine
§ 62.2 - Professional licensing examinations
§ 62.3 - Endorsement
§ 62.4 - Professional study for veterinary technicians
§ 62.5 - Licensing examination for veterinary technicians
§ 62.6 - Endorsement for veterinary technicians
§ 62.7 - Practice of veterinary technology

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 62

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 207, 212, 6501, 6504, 6506, 6507, 6508, 6704, 6711[5], arts. 130, 131, 133, 135, 139, 143, 144, 147, 148, 155, 156, 159; L. 1990, ch. 333;L. 2010, ch. 328

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
